summary: Comprehensive testing completed for hunting safety web app explore routes feature. Backend APIs working excellently with 90% success rate. Frontend fully functional with all features working: route browsing, search, favorites, map display, and user interactions.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 'Already in favorites' when trying to add existing favorite
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - not a bug. API correctly prevents duplicate favorites

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/routes/public returns 6 public routes with owner_name and point_count
Backend: POST /api/favorites/{route_id} adds route to favorites (user already had 1 favorite)
Backend: GET /api/favorites returns favorited routes with geometry
Backend: GET /api/favorites/ids returns array of favorited route IDs
Frontend: /explore page displays list of 6 public routes with names, owners, points
Frontend: /explore page shows Leaflet map with 3 active hunting zones indicated
Frontend: Clicking route shows selection styling and detail card
Frontend: Heart icons toggle favorites (filled=favorited, empty=not favorited)
Frontend: Favorites tab shows count badge (1) and lists favorited routes
Frontend: Search input filters routes by name (Sierra search found 1 route)
Frontend: Explore link properly accessible in navbar
Frontend: Map tiles load properly with zone indicators

success_percentage.backend: 90% (9/10 tests passed - 1 expected behavior flagged as 'failed')
